CHAT.comment: WANDA KRUPSKI, Petitioner v. COSTA CROCIERE, S.P.A.
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 10:09 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MARK R. BENDURE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF ROBERT S. GLAZIER ON BEHALF OF THE RESPONDENT
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MARK R. BENDURE ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
